metadata.name: Your Eyes - Shard 1
metadata.description:
Shard 1 of 9 of the exquisite abstract-expressionist auction piece commissioned by Melbourne based artist Kerry Armstrong that is twinned with a physical counterpart.

The owner of this NFT will recieve exclusive access to a time-lapse video of the creation of "Your Eyes" as well.

Ten percent of all future sales proceeds will go towards funding medical research into the second most common form of muscular dystrophy, Facioscapulohumeral Dystrophy (FSHD) by the FSHD Global Research Foundation.

Done in collaboration with Zerocap, Pellar Technology and Studio Gallery.
